title: On My Lips
raw:
[Verse]
[C]All the chains are broken, [Am]I have been set free
[F]Every word You've spoken [G]is watching over me
[C]So how can I stay silent [Am] when I hear you call my name
[F]Living in Your presence [G] I'll never be the same
 
[Pre-Chorus] 
[F]I've been [C]found in You[G]
and now [F]I'll sing [C]out Your truth[G]
 
[Chorus]       
On my [C]lips there's a shout of praise               
Now I'm gonna [Am]dance for all my days                                             
because I've [F]seen the wonder of Your loving ways[G]         
So much [C]joy here in Your embrace                
makes me wanna [Am]sing and celebrate                                           
because I've [F]seen the wonder [G]of amazing grace

[Instrumental]
[C] [Am] [F] [F]

[Verse]
[C]All the chains are broken, [Am]I have been set free
[F]Every word You've spoken [G]is watching over me

[F]Living in Your presence [G] I'll never be the same

and now [F]I'll sing [C]out Your truth[G]

So much [C]joy here in Your embrace                
makes me wanna [Am]sing and celebrate
